statements: UPDATE survey_responses SET feedback = 'Good job' WHERE response_id = 1;

UPDATE Monitor_Event_Feedback SET feedback_rating = 4, feedback_comments = 'Good event' WHERE event_id = 101
UPDATE Survey_Responses SET respondent_name = 'Alice', survey_date = '2021-10-15', survey_answers = '{"q1": "Yes", "q2": "No", "q3": "Maybe"}' WHERE survey_id = 201
UPDATE Monitor_Event_Feedback SET feedback_comments = 'Great event, highly engaging' WHERE event_id = 123
UPDATE Survey_Responses SET survey_answers = '{"q1": "Yes", "q2": "No", "q3": "Maybe"}', respondent_name = 'Alice' WHERE survey_id = 456

UPDATE SurveyResponses SET response = 'Agree' WHERE participant_id = 'e33f9c85-0666-438f-b4a3-e6f1f2e968ec' AND survey_id = '5073a733-6714-4f99-83f7-81ebf7d4f2cb';
